title: 2005 Chrysler Town & Country Mini Van
item_description:
2005 Chrysler Town & Country Mini Van

Specifications

  • Year: 2005
  • Make: Chrysler
  • Model: Town & Country
  • VIN: 2C4GP44R35R252557
  • Oregon License: 964MMS
    • Oregon Registration Expiration: 11/04/2024
  • Odometer Reads: 184838
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 5,550 Lbs
  • Drive Type: Front Wheel Drive
  • Engine: 3.3L V6 OHV 12V
  • Body Style: Mini Van
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 215/70R15

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Blue
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Features:
    • 3rd Row Seats
    • CD Player
    • Cruise Control
    • Multi-Zone Climate Control
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Air Conditioning

Note: This vehicle is currently titled and registered in Oregon. The buyer will receive a Certificate of Oregon Title and Oregon Bill of Sale 1-2 weeks following removal. The Seller is selling this vehicle "as-is" without smog as the vehicle is currently not registered with California DMV. The Buyer agrees to sign an "as-is" no smog Bill of Sale. The buyer agrees to 1. be fully responsible for the vehicle registration process from Oregon to California (if they so choose), 2. to smog if they want to transfer registration to California, 3. any repairs to the vehicle for smog (if any), 4. inspections and 5. taxes and all fees due to DMV to register this vehicle in the Buyers name. A bid placed on this lot is an agreement to these terms by the Seller. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual, the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same."
